modName: Jaffa Staff Mod and Sound Effects original - Stargate SG-1
summary: Add the Ma'Tok Staff, a Goa'uld weapon. Also with the original sound effects.
descriptionHtml:
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

DESCRIPTION:
Hello everyone! With this mod you can add the Ma'Tok, the Goa'uld weapon of Stargate! This also add the original sounds when you charge the Staff and when shoot.
This weapon can be forge in a smith, in the |Misc| section.
Finally, with this weapon you can shoot more fast than the other: just click to fire, it's not need to charge your weapon!
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

INSTALLATION AND UNISTALLATION:
Download ad install the package with NMM OR put the file manually in their respective folders.
To remove, just unistall this mod with the manager OR delete manually the file.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

CHANGELOG:
v 2.0.0
- Add package for a new sound for fire.
- Improved sound. Now the packages doesn't replace the other spell sound.
- Improved damage. Now every shot are more powerful.
- Improved speed. Now you just click to fire. No charge nedded.
- Improved materials needed to forge it.
- Improved name.
- Bug fixed.
v 1.0.1
- Add a description for the weapon.
- Add a single package with model and sound fx.
- Bug fixed.
v 1.0.0
- Initial release
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

SUPPLEMENTARY MOD:
- Zat Gun Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41638//?
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

NOTE:
- The original 3D model was not made by me, I made the sound fx package and I improve the all.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

IF YOU LIKE THIS MOD, PLEASE ENDORSE AND VOTE!
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
